segments.text: It's Clive of course . Where did you come from ? Every girl knows Clive !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shooting guard . The same as Michael Jordan !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I love Michael Jordan . He fills people's lives with great excitement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Used to . But now he is too old to play in a fierce game like this . But Kobe is the upcoming superstar now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kobe is a good player but I heard he is a womanizer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is not true . They are just jealous of him !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jordan is a legend , anyway . An idol that no one can replace . I think Clive can make a good professional basketball player . He is not just about muscles he also plays smart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what , he is also an outstanding football player . He is surely to be a star of tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , do you know if he has a girl friend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so not here ! His girlfriend is one of the cheer leaders .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , My chance is slim then .
segments.speaker: S1
